entry.title: Latex Beamer for EMSE
entry.content:
Here there is a template for presentation at École des Mines de Saint-Étienne in Latex. This is not a STY file for beamer but is base on, so you must call the EMSE_beamer.tex file explicitly from your TEX file for presentations.

EMSE_Beamer
entry.summary: Here there is a template for presentation at École des Mines de Saint-Étienne in Latex. This is not a STY file for beamer but is base on, so you must call the EMSE_beamer.tex file explicitly from your TEX file for presentations.
